coreApi.comment: the coreApi provided to each service at initialization time

core.comment: runtime data relative to the whole application

package.comment: the package instance of the calling @iztiar/iztiar-core core module

config.comment: the configuration instance filled-up from <configDir>/iztiar.json core configuration file

exports.comment: the whole list of the definitions exported by the calling @iztiar/iztiar-core core module

service.comment: the instance which describes the service from calling @iztiar/iztiar-core core module point of view
